headline: Conmed (CNMD) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Top Estimates
summary: Conmed (CNMD) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +1.77% and +0.81%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Albany International Corp. Appoints Willard Station as Executive Vice President – Chief Financial Officer
summary: ROCHESTER, N.H., July 30, 2025--Albany International Corp. (NYSE: AIN) announced today that its Board of Directors has appointed Willard Station as Executive Vice President – Chief Financial Officer, and elected him an officer of the Company effective September 1, 2025. Mr. Station has also been appointed Principal Financial Officer, succeeding Jairaj (JC) Chetnani, the Company’s Vice President – Investor Relations and Treasurer, who has served as interim Chief Financial Officer since May 23, 20

headline: Stocks Are Way Too Expensive. Why You Should Buy Them Anyway.
summary: Investors using only valuation to pick stocks could prove “arrogant or incompetent,” according to Trivariate Research President Adam Parker.

headline: McKesson Corporation Raises Quarterly Dividend by 15% to $0.82 Per Share
summary: IRVING, Texas, July 30, 2025--The Board of Directors of McKesson Corporation (NYSE:MCK) yesterday declared a regular dividend of $0.82 per share of common stock, a 15% increase from $0.71 per share in the prior quarter. The dividend will be payable on October 1, 2025, to stockholders of record on September 2, 2025.
